text: Pippa Middleton is sporting a big baby bump – but when is she due? ( Picture : Backgrid ) Pippa Middleton is due to give birth to her and husband James Matthews ’ first child together. The younger sister of Kate Middleton, Duchess of Cambridge, has been spotted out and about in London on a number of occasions lately, sporting her large baby bump. Pippa and James ’ baby will not only have James ’ brother Spencer Matthews and his wife Vogue Williams ’ son Theodore Fredrick Michael as a cousin, but the unborn child will also have Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis as cousins. The new arrival will also be the first niece or nephew for both William and Kate, as neither William ’ s brother Prince Harry or Kate ’ s brother James Middleton have children.
